Pocatello.KPKY:
KPKY (94.9 FM, "94.9 & 104.5 The Rock") is a commercial radio station located in Pocatello, Idaho. KPKY airs a classic rock music format.


== Ownership ==
In October 2007, a deal was reached for KPKY to be acquired by GAP Broadcasting II LLC (Samuel Weller, president) from Clear Channel Communications as part of a 57 station deal with a total reported sale price of $74.78 million.
